message: Hello! I'm offering a unique product for $10000. It has the potential to be incredibly valuable, but there's a chance it might not be worth much. I'm confident in the quality of my products overall, and I'm sure this one will bring you great value. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  Since there's no sales history yet, I'm willing to take a chance on your product. Let's do it!
